channel.title: Get started on Security365 Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Get started on Security365 Docs

item.title: Create API token
item.description: Create an API token PrerequisiteBefore you begin, find your zone and account IDs. From the Cloudflare dashboard External link icon Open external link , go to My Profile > API Tokens. Select Create Token. Select a template from the available API token templates or create a custom token. We use the Edit zone DNS template in the following examples. Add or edit the token name to describe why or how the token is used.

item.title: Get API keys (legacy)
item.description: Get API keys (legacy)API keys are the previous authorization scheme for interacting with the Cloudflare API. When possible, use API tokens instead of API keys. ​â€‹ Limitations API keys have multiple limitations when compared to API tokens: Access to all Cloudflare resources - API keys have access to all of a user’s resources. This makes it impossible to safely use API keys to access non-production resources when a user also has access to production resources.
